nodes.text: The Hawkeyes were a Twi'lek group of slicers and techs who were regarded as the best technicians on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY, the Galactic Republic wished to hack Balmorra's Hawkeye controlled satellite systems from the Sith Empire. To do so, they had an individual talk to a Hawkeye named Iain Sarkus. As a result of this, Iain's fellow Hawkeyes were to be executed by the Empire. Fortunately for them, this individual managed to rescue them just in time to avoid execution from the Okara Droid Factory.
